content: @Vadim Peretokin I think http://fhir-formats.github.io/# has a problem with Questionnaires and nested items - when I upload any of the STU3 Questionnaire XML examples, xml->json does not work. When I remove nested items, conversion does work.
@Marc de Graauw I'll check it out. Could you give an example questionnaire you can share in https://github.com/vadi2/fhir-formats/issues/new ?
